text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Achoo! I can't believe she dropped<n>me into a waterfall...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Who would do such a thing? I'll<n>personally knock the snot
out of that<n>dastardly villain!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: You were so far ahead of us. What on<n>earth happened?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Sigh... It upsets me to even thinkof it, but...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Here's the chapel... This must be the<n>finish line.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Oh my, my, my! You're the firstto finish the race!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Me? But wasn't Mayano ahead of—

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Never mind. If I'm the first to finish,<n>that means I can make
my proposal,<n>correct?

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Did you think that merely arriving<n>here the fastest
would give you the<n>right to propose?

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
A rigorous trial to overcome! The<n>beauty of a proposal made
after<n>surviving it all!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
What matters is whether your<n>journey sparks my beauty
sensors to<n>life! ♪

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Although you are an exemplary<n>student, Air Groove, you are
still<n>lacking oomph.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Crossing the finish line with such acool expression won't generate anyheat! You have to show me somefiery passion!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: So... you're saying I'm not worthy of<n>be your muse?

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Hm... Let's just say you're not thereyet!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Long ago, your mother showed my<n>master a beauty so
wondrous, it<n>inspired them to craft a special set of<n>
racewear for her.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
During my apprenticeship, they<n>shared your mother's story
with me<n>while showing off a photo of her<n>wearing that
racewear.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
She looked so powerful and dignified,<n>and she drew
everyone's attention<n>just by standing there.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
It was so beautiful... I made a solemn<n>vow then and there to
one day create<n>racewear just like the one your<n>mother
wore.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
But even though you're her daughter,<n>you're simply no
good! You are not fit<n>for me nor the racewear as you are<n>
now.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
I understand you are aiming to be the<n>Empress, but it
seems you only see<n>your racewear and this audition as<n>
mere stepping stones on your<n>journey.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
And so, for you, my dear Air Groove...<n>Enjoooy! ☆ Here
comes the Beauty<n>Aqua Slide!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Wha?! The floor's—

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Make sure to show me your true<n>beauty the next time we
meet! ♪

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: UWAAAUGH!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: It seems that "Aqua Slide" was<n>connected to this waterfall.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, what a shame! Even if you<n>wanted to take revenge,
it's not like<n>you could beat her up or anything!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Beat her up? No, I don't need to do<n>that. The next time we
meet, I’m going<n>to make her acknowledge me. That's<n>
how I'll exact my revenge.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Hm, so this is the cliff and signboard<n>you were talking
about.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
"The road shall not open for those<n>who lack beauty." I
suppose I have...<n>some inkling as to what this means.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Really?!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I don't know what "beauty" is<n>supposed to mean in this
case, but<n>it's probably saying we need to climb<n>this cliff.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
It's an entirely outrageous command,<n>but if that woman is
the one who put<n>this here, it's just par for the course.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: In that case, I'm going to climb up!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
If it helps me become a muse, I'll<n>scale any walls that stand
in my way!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
This is what you meant when you<n>were talking about
working toward<n>becoming your ideal self, right,<n>
Kawakami?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Dober... Yes, that's right!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I want to better myself, and I need<n>that racewear to gain the
strength to<n>change!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Even if I don't have confidence right<n>now, I've decided to
stay resolute and<n>pour everything I have into this!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
That's the spirit! Now all you need is<n>determination and
guts!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
All right, I'd better get started too. ♪<n>When it comes to
dreams, no one can<n>beat this strength of mine!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Hm... A strong resolution and the<n>passion to back it up...
Those certainly<n>are beautiful things.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
"The road shall not open for those<n>who lack beauty." ...There
may be a<n>path for me after all.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
(After talking to Ms. Beauty, the<n>admiration I held as a child
toward my<n>mother and her racewear has grown<n>even
stronger...)

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Even now, that admiration—these<n>beautiful feelings of
mine—remains in<n>my heart.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I'm right behind you, Dober,<n>Kawakami!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Air Groove?!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Now we're talking! ♪ Let's pummel<n>Beauty with all our
hopes and dreams<n>once we reach her at the top of the<n>
cliff!
